rubrik_polaris.lib.common package¶

Core Rubrik Functions¶

Collection of methods that interact with Polaris primitives.

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.get_event_series_list(self, object_type=[], status=[], activity_type=[], severity=[], cluster_ids=[], start_time=None, end_time=None)¶

Retrieve Events from Polaris

Parameters

  • {[str]} -- Array of Object Types (object_type) –

  • {[str]} -- Array of Event Status (status) –

  • {[str]} -- Array of Activity Types (activity_type) –

  • {[str]} -- Array of severities (severity) –

  • {[UUID]} -- Array of Cluster IDs (cluster_ids) –

  • {datetime} -- Timestamp to start return set from (start_date) –

  • {datetime} -- Timestamp to end return set from (end_date) –

Returns

arr of dict – An array of dictionaries of Event Data

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.get_sla_domains(self, sla_domain_name='')¶

Retrieves dictionary of SLA Domain Names and Identifiers.

Keyword Arguments

{str} -- Rubrik SLA Domain name (default (sla_domain_name) – {‘’})

Returns

str – ID for the given SLA Domain name as given by sla_domain_name dict – The complete set of SLA domains or a one element dict if a non-empty sla_domain_name is given and found.

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.get_snapshots(self, snappable_id, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve Snapshots for a Snappable from Polaris

Parameters

  • {str} -- Object UUID (snappable_id) –

  • {str} -- Optional datetime of snapshot to return (recovery_point) –

  • 'latest' (or) –

  • not defined to return all (or) –

Returns

dict – A dictionary of snapshots or a single snapshot if ‘latest’ was passed as recovery_point. If no snapshots are found, an empty dict is returned.

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.get_task_status(self, task_chain_id)¶

Retrieve task status from Polaris

Parameters

{str} -- Task Chain UUID from request (task_chain_id) –

Returns

str – Task state

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.submit_assign_sla(self, object_ids, sla_id)¶

Submits a Rubrik SLA change for objects

Parameters

  • {[str]} -- Array of Rubrik Object IDs (object_ids) –

  • {str} -- Rubrik SLA Domain ID (sla_id) –

Returns

list – List of objects assigned the SLA

rubrik_polaris.lib.common.core.submit_on_demand(self, object_ids, sla_id, wait=False)¶

Submits On Demand Snapshot request for the given set of object id’s and assign the given SLA to the snapshots.

Parameters

  • {[str]} -- Array of Rubrik Object IDs (object_ids) –

  • {str} -- Rubrik SLA Domain ID (sla_id) –

Keyword Arguments

{bool} -- Threaded wait for all processes to complete (default (wait) – {False})

Returns

list – List of errors if any occurred
